title: The HZ Comedians (2011)
overview: A university specialising in grooming comedians is in crisis for lack of talents, and their scouts go and recruit students who clearly lack funny bones.
storyline: A prophecy foretells the extinction of all comedians in Thailand. Alarmed by the looming threat, the dean and executives of the University of Laughter embark upon a mission to find their "saviors" so that future comedians can carry the torch of laughter for generations to come.
